meanings.definition: The quality or state of being whole or undamaged.
meanings.sent1: The intactnesses of the ancient artifact amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The intactnesses of the glass after the fall surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The intactnesses of the cake after the kids' party was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The intactnesses of her heart after the breakup was a true testament to her strength.
meanings.sent5: The intactnesses of the puzzle pieces made it easier to complete the picture.

meanings.definition: The condition of being complete or unimpaired.
meanings.sent1: The intactnesses of the document was crucial for its validity.
meanings.sent2: The intactnesses of the roof ensured the house stayed dry during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The intactnesses of the plan remained intact despite the unexpected changes.
meanings.sent4: The intactnesses of the team's spirit led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The intactnesses of the friendship was evident in their unwavering support for each other.
